What are the treatments for UV-sensitive syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of UV-sensitive syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: UV-sensitive syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: UV-sensitive syndrome 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: UV-sensitive syndrome 3  - Merck Manual Home Health Edition: Sunburn  - World Health Organization: Sun Protection   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of var
